title: Phone Crossbody Lanyard, 120cm Acrylic Beads Phone Strap with Tether Tab,Universal Cell Phone Chain for Most Phones Bag Purse
description: 【Stylish and Easy to Carry Design】:The crossbody phone strap is made of acrylic material and PU leather, the shoulders won't feel sore. The and this phones strap is a stylish and trendy cellphone lanyard strap that combines functionality with a touch of elegance. it will perfectly enhance the appearance decoration of the phone case, making your phone case more fashionable, charming and distinctive.

【Durable and High quality Materials】:The cellphone chain is made of high-quality acrylic material,strung together with durable rope,which is strong and extremely lightweight without causing weight burden,wear-resistant, scratch-resistant, can be used for a long time without fading, and the rope is strong and not easy to break. With a metal clasp, this bead chain can be easily connected or disassembled.

【Anti-Lost&Free Your Hands Phone Strap】: The phone lanyard length size is 120cm/47.24inch ,Weight is 100g/0.22lb,is great for crossbody or shoulder carrying, allows you to keep your phone within easy to reach while keeping your hands free. Suitable for you want to keep your hands completely free to outdoors walking, hiking, shopping ,working etc.

【Easy to Use, Wide compatibility】: the phone strap is coming with a ultra-thin Tethers Tab with durable [D]metal ring, Compatible for most smartphones with a full coverage case, and keep your phone in safe condition and easy using. No tools required, you just pass the pad through charging hole of fully covered phone case, then insert your phone and connect to the lanyard. the thin pad could support corded and wireless charging without being removed, without blocking the charging port.

【Multifunction Phone Strap】: The beaded phone lanyard is not only a beautiful decorative chain for all phone cases, but also can be very sturdy & easy to change out with your purse/bag/handbag/wallet/clutch handbage etc.,added this chain strap to your purse/bag/crossbody, Shoulder Strap Replacement,works great, chain strap can holds
